attributes.action: Demonization of the British Muslim Community
attributes.additional_details:
I want to find out which organisations are behind the demonization of the British Muslim community in the Print Media, TV Media, Social Media, and in general society at large.

I want the Government to discuss this in parliament as to what could be the motives behind these organisations as to why their is so much sheer determination by these organisations to portray the British Muslim community as being extremist.

I want the Government to authorize a series of positive  media campaigns via the TV media, Social Media and Print Media  about the British Muslim community in the UK Society.

rejection.details: This a matter for each individual media organisation to address.  There are already laws against religious and racial hatred.
